title: Reserve Library Group Study Room
description: A group of students needs to reserve a group study room in the main library for next Tuesday.

tasks.description: Guide the user to the library's online room booking system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the direct URL for the booking system.

tasks.description: Explain the booking policies, such as maximum reservation time and advance booking limits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the rules (e.g., 'max 2 hours per day').

tasks.description: Assist the student in navigating the system to find an available room and complete the reservation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent walks the student through the process, resulting in a successful booking.
